answers.answer: Have you been diagnosed with diabetes 2?  Have you posted on the heart site as well?
Pinched nerves in your spine can do that

question: Hi, well I have been having alot of problems with numbness in the legs and arms .Recently I woke up in the middle of the night and couldn't feel my left arm , picked it up with my right arm and it just dropped , I was really scared but 5 min later I started to feel my finger tips and then my hand and you know the rest.Two days ago for the fourth of July I sat down in the car not even a min yet and couldnt feel parts of my left leg , I'm so young and I have a doctors appointment coming up but I don't know what going on with me.
title: Body problems
